title: Poems and translations amorous, lusory, morall, divine [collected and translated] by Edvvard Sherburne ...
author: Sherburne, Edward, Sir, 1618-1702.
publisher: Printed by W. Hunt, for Thomas Dring ...,
notes: Published also in 1651 with title: Salmacis ; Lyrian & Sylvia ;  Forsaken Lydia ; The rape of Helen ; a comment thereon, with several other poems and translations.
"The rape of Helen" has special t.p. on p. [41]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

Salmacis / by Seigneur Girolamo Preti ; out of Italian -- The metamorphosis of Lyrian and Sylvia / by St. Amant ; out of French -- Forsaken Lydia / out of the Italian of Cavalier Marino -- The rape of Hellen / out of the Greek of Coluthus [sic]
